author: Giuseppe Cipriani
description: It's hard not to like this blend of peaches and sparkling wine. Lemon juice adds balance and a citrusy bite while peach schnapps boosts peachy flavour. If you prefer drier then switch prosecco to brut champagne.
name: Bellini (Difford's recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass charged with the prosecco
